Finally you broke through only to watch in horror as two pink feet wiggled, the vanished from sight. A burp and the ogre patting his bulging stomach.

"Yeah, best jello ever!"
13221.title: Remember about Claire. Where is she?

choices: It's a zapper that turns anyone it hits into your Friend with a capital F.
132212.content:
You almost literally see red. That... thing... ate your sister! Drank your sister. Whatever!

There is a crash and a table tumbles beside you, knocked over by a centaur. Centaur? You shake your head and ignore it. You have more important things to worry about, an Ogre licking it's lips and patting it's squirming belly for one thing!

Without thinking you reach out to the collapsed table, grabbing a broken phone, a cup of the little cardboard umbrellas for drinks, and a little pump for a fish tank (The ones that make those little bubbles in aquariums). Odd since there isn't a fish tank around.

Your hands flash, you whipping out screwdrivers, pliers, wrenches and things from a belt that previously was just paper-mache. Now it's more like a utility belt!

With a flourish you flick a... what have you just made? How did you make it? Blinking you begin to realize you ARE Dr Hypno!

Never mind that, help Claire! You point the device at the Ogre and use your thumb to press a big red button on the phone that acts like a pistol trigger. You know you must have designed this thing for something specific to help Claire, but what? You weren't paying attention at the time and were just mad! Heck, you didn't know you could do that!
132212.title: Dr Hypno awakens.

choices: "Why? Oh that felt so cool!" She LIKED being eaten? OK, Claire's weird!
"Thank you... who are you again?" Yeah, she's really stupid alright.
1322121.content:
Bubbles pop on the end, then incredibly shoot forwards like bullets! They pop with little resonating 'Blurp's and the Ogre suddenly looks very odd.

"I... Urp... feel... *Blurk* Funny" he says, his voice gradually going up in tone.

There is a visible gurgle, then the face shifts, twisting, hair lengthening, neck shrinking, chin changing. Wow! But the body also shifts. Still looks Ogrish, but large bulges poke out his shirt, and the hips widen, waist narrowing...

The Ogress before you puts a hand to her head and slaps it.

"Ooooh, I feel funny." She says in a very sexy voice. Then she turns to you and smiles.

"Hey, you be my friend, yes?"

Huh?

"Er, sure. My name's... Dr Hypno." You say "But you can call me Sam."

"Sam." The Ogress said simply, smiling "I like you. Like you lots and lots."

Blinking you stare at the frantically squirming bulge in the Ogress' gut. Oh right, Claire.

"OK, miss Ogress could y... "

"Michelle." She says simply.

Riiight. Michelle the Ogress.

"OK, Michelle, could you throw up my friend? The one you ate?"

"Pink jello girl?" She says, looks confused for a moment, shakes her head dizzily, then smiles. "Oh, sure. Whatever you say Sam."

Michelle then leans over and 'hurks' a few times, before beginning to throw up your slimy sister. After some very unpleasant noises Claire comes out in a torrent of pink goo, at first nothing more than a pink splatter on the floor, but she soon pulls herself together.

"OoooOOooh." She moans, sitting up, looking dizzy.

"I'm so sorry I couldn't stop that! The guy..." You across at 'Michelle'. "The girl ate you so quick I couldn't do anything. I made sure to get you out though, as soon as I could!"
1322121.title: The (F)riend maker.

choices: It's a reverser, turning the Ogre back to human, spitting slime Claire out.
1322122.content:
The device humms, a little umbrella opens on the end and starts to spin and it starts making bubbles... then suddenly the bubbles shoot forwards like a rocket, popping against the Ogre! It's like a bubble gun or something.

But the bubbles are doing something, the Ogre looks odd.
1322122.title: Other options.

choices: The three of you make a dash for it.
13221221.content:
There is a gurgling sound, the Ogre blinks, then shivers, then rapidly shrinks, gurgling noises coming from it's stomach. It's shredded clothes tumble to the floor and then it winces, belches, and heaves over, vomiting heavily. A torrent of green goo sprays the walls as the Ogre turns into a rather surprised looking teenager with acne and an overbite... and no clothes!

"I... I... AARRGGGHH!!!" he yells and runs off.

You glance in shock at the device you whipped up and realize finally you really ARE Dr Hypno! You built a transformation gun... or untransformation gun you guess. Reverser? You shrug, that'll work.

"Gnnnn. OK, funky." The pile of green goo says, slowly reforming into Claire laying on the floor. "Heh, fun though. Kinda felt sexy."

You blink, then just run over and kneel beside her.

"Are you OK Claire?" You stammer "I mean, god you were just eaten!"

"Was I? Oh yeah, I remember. Ugly guy, but felt cool.... Uh, where am I again?" You roll your eyes, then realize you can use the Reverser on Claire.

"Hold still, we'll have you back to normal in no time Claire!" you say, and raise the gun and point it at Claire, pressing the firing button.

A couple of bubble pop out, there is a spark, and a kind of churning, winding down noise. No rapid bubbles shooting forwards though. You shake the thing, annoyed, try again, but it's no use. It's not working! Huh, that's when you remember that most of the useful things Dr Hypno builds in your comics only work a few times before they break, so they don't make the next story unworkable. You wanted him to constantly build cool gadgets, and if he could just use an old gadget it wouldn't be the same.

"Nuts!" You say, then try to help Claire up. "I'll try and fix it, but not now. Claire, Juno, Tina? We gotta get out of here!"

And the surroundings are getting more and more hectic! One wall of the building has caved in and hundreds of strange creatures are getting more and more panicky!
13221221.title: Reverser.

choices: The Ogre instantly becomes Zombie like, even dumber and open to suggestion.
13221222.content: The Ogre bats the bubbles away furiously, but he almost looks dazed. It's definitely having some kind of effect.
13221222.title: The device does something else.

choices: No, she was just joking. She can eat them, but that feels wrong to her.
Oh yes she is! It's hard to get her NOT to eat a girl!
She just wants to swallow girls, not hurt them. She likes to feel them slide in.
135.content:
"Better watch out! I may decide to get a taste for boys! He he!" Juno said tagging along behind you "Second thoughts, boys are way too disgusting to eat!"

You were just about to turn and tell her to stop following you...

*ZZZAAAPP!*

You collapsed to the floor as did a lot of people around you. In fact from the loud crashes it sounded like most of the party had just fallen over! Juno fell on you and... wait that was odd. She felt... smooth. Looking down you saw her shake her head and lift it... and there was a snake looking at you! OK, not quite, it had human eyes and tongue, even the lips moved like a persons, but it LOOKED like a snake head with a two foot long neck! The body beneath it looked like a naked woman but with snake scales and a long tail. She wore a very familiar loose jacket, unzipped at the front to show off her very buxom attributes!

"Sssam? Whatssss happened?" The apparition said up to you. Oh god that sounded like Juno! Her body looked like a real version of the 'Naga' thing she'd worn! Her jacket had just lost the 'hoody' that was now her snake head! That was when you noticed that you felt odd yourself, kind of twitchy. You scratched your head... but the wig didn't move! You tried to pull it off and found it was your own hair! Glancing at a nearby glass door you saw you looked kind of like a young Einstein, well, if Einstein had had his shaggy white hair when he was young! That was pretty much the perfect look of Dy Hypno. You'd used your own face for him in the comics so that was no different. What was going on?

*GURRGLE!*

"Oooh, I'm hungry!" Juno the Naga said, clutching her belly. "Ssssam, are there any girlsssss I can eat?"

You stare in shock at Juno. She can't be serious! Can she?
135.title: ZZZAP!

choices: Grab your sisters and take them home away from this chaos!
Wait, where's your Mom? "AYAYAYAYAYIEEEE!" Oh god, Xena!
Try to find out why this is all happening.
1353.content:
"Juno! I can't believe you want to kill people!" You gasp.

Juno the Naga looks suitably shocked, hurriedly shaking her head.

"Oh no no no! I'd never hurt anyone! I just want to tasssste them... head to foot... preferably minussss clothing." And she giggled. "Well, and maybe keep them inside me for a few hours."

"Oh good grief!" You moan, but the panic and noise about you is getting worse and you see some very weird 'people' around. Juno and yourself weren't the only ones affected!

You see a real, honest to got, half man half wolf. The B-movie version of a werewolf. There is s girl who looks the spitting image of a fairy tale princess, long flowing gown, regal features, little sparkling tiara. In the corner is a... fairy? She's maybe eight inches tall in a skimpy, tight fitting one piece... leaf? Looks just like a bigger Tinkerbell!

"AROOOO!"

You blink as a naked... dog girl?... bounds past, charging at the werewolf who 'arf's in a scared fashion and dashes off. Seems he's met his match! She's six foot tall, furry hands, feet and ears, but otherwise human... Oh, except the button nose. Very sexy. You hope the werewolf likes her 'cos it looks like she's faster than he is!

*SQUELCH!*

Suddenly you can't breath, something wet, sticky and all pervading is everywhere on you, covering you from head to foot and blocking your vision, just letting green tinged light through barely. It heaves, presses and kneads you, creeping inside your clothes and you actually feel yourself lifted from the floor. You notice faint sounds of commotion out side for a few seconds, then...

*SPLURGE!*

You land in a sticky heap, trails of slime and goo slowly pouring out from inside your clothes, stroking across your rather hard shaft, as you recognise... Claire... sort of. She's become a REAL girl made entirely of semitransparent green slime!

"Oh Sam! I'm sorry! I meant to hug you. Didn't mean to eat you! I'm just so scared... Um... why am I scared again? Oh help me Sam help me!"

She'd turned into her slime character... she said they were stupid didn't she? Other than that she seemed sort of herself, if a little clingy to you.
1353.title: Just a little swallow.

choices: You bump into one of the party goers, some one mentioned.
You bump into someone you hadn't seen before.
13531.content:
You blink, but there is surprisingly little goo on you. Perhaps she sucked it all back into herself? Still, you wipe your sticky hair down and grab the hands of both of them... looking worriedly as one hands sinks inside Claire's.

"OK, this place is turning into a madhouse! We need to get out of here!" you said and dragged them towards the door.

"But aren't we forgetting something?" Claire said, frowning. She'd probably forget her own name now! You dash on pulling them after you.

As you dash through the room towards the exit you see a flash as some form of flying, human shaped flame zooms past you, then through a wall! A mass of tentacles shoots up from a crowd and sticks to the ceiling... with legs sticking out from it. Writhing legs! An honest to god female centaur (naked of course!) trots past, looking very nervous and a spitting image of batman shoots out of the skylight on a grappling line. This place was nuts!

You reach the entrance and crash through the doors, dragging your sisters with you.

"Phew! Now lets get home before any of them get out of there... or any more get out..." You add as you see a trail of destruction leading away from the building, probably from that fire girl who shot past you.
13531.title: Away from the chaos!

choices: Either the Dog girl or the little fairy.
The centaur or the tentacle girl from the ceiling.
135311.content:
You stumble out of the parking lot, still hanging on to your sisters and head onto the street leading to your house when you crash into someone, all four of your tumbling to the floor.

"Oof!"

You sit up, rubbing your side, and see...
135311.title: One of the party goers

1353111.title: Either the Dog girl or the little fairy.

choices: You arrive home and try to figure out what to do.
When you get home Juno seems VERY horny. Uh oh!
13531112.content:
Looking down you are surprised to see the tiny fairy girl sitting dazedly on the floor. It felt like you hit something much bigger than that! Maybe she weighs more than she looks?

"I'm sorry miss, didn't mean to hit you!" and you stagger to your feet again, aiming to run home again.

An odd tinkling sound comes from the ground and you glance down to see she is trying to talk... and instead making an odd noise. Oh, Tinkerbell from the story did that too didn't she? You feel sorry for her, now unable to talk to anyone, and she looks very sad.

She zips off the ground in a blur of golden wings and shoots right at you, wrapping her little arms around your neck and hugging tightly!

"Whoah! I... er..." You ponder. It seems she doesn't want to be left alone. Well, you guess you wouldn't either if you were only eight inches tall! "Um, OK, you can come too if you like." You say, and see a smile bob up in front of you as she releases the hug and floats before you.

You shake your head and carry on home, now with three girls in tow
13531112.title: The tiny fairy girl

choices: Try to get Claire to understand who she is.
You belatedly remember your Mom! Eek! You left her at the party!
135311121.content:
After a dash through the streets and almost bumping into several weird people (one was an eight foot tall dragon person and breathed fire for heaven's sake!) you, your sisters and the fairy arrived at your place.

"OK, quick, in in! Before any more hostiles show up." You mutter, still cringing from that flapping thing that tried to claw at you as you made the corner of 4th and 12th. You still don't know what that thing was!

"Oooh, nice place. D'you live here?" Claire asked and you stared at her... OK, at her and through her. Being partially transparent was really weird to look at.

"Um, yes Claire, and so do you." you say carefully.

"Oh, cool. Am I your girlfriend?"

You blink, staring at Juno, then back at Claire. Juno giggles beside you.

"You're my Sister Claire."

"I'm a nun called Sister Claire?"

You slap your hand to your face and groan. This was going to take a long time!
135311121.title: You arrive home and try to figure out what to do.

choices: Juno can't wait and rapes you then and there!
She practically forces you upstairs to Claire.
1353111211.content:
"No no Claire. Your name is Claire and you are my Sister. OK?" She nods.

"Cool.... this is a nice place, do you live here?"

Juno giggles and steps in before you can say anything.

"Yes, and you're his girlfriend."

"Oh cool!" Claire says, and slurps and gurgles upstairs.

"Juno? What are you doing?" You say, exasperatedly.

"Getting you laid of course. With her it should be REALLY interesting. What would sex with a Jello Girl be like? Can I join in?"

You blink, staring at Juno, who's eyes were steaming right now, a sexy grin plastered on her face.

"Juno? What's up with you?" You say nervously.

"You mean other than wanting to fuck your brains out? Not a lot. Come on, Nagas are always horny, surely you know that! And they are VERY into family bonding! He he!"

OK, Juno had some seriously weird ideas about Nagas it seemed, and now her concept of them has become real somehow! Why was all this happening?
1353111211.title: Try to get Claire to understand who she is.

info.brief_description: A witch turns everyone into their costumes. You are Dr. Hypno, PhD, MD, MC, TF, TG
info.description:
Welcome to Mystic Hallows, a town with a history rich with the occult. Stories of witches and demons are passed from parent to child. And if there is one holiday that is celebrated here it is Halloween, which is tonight. You are going out for the celebration with your mother, Laura (38), your older sister, Claire(18), and your younger sister, Juno(16). You are 17 years old. Your father died when you were young, so you are very close with your mother and sisters. All three of them are near carbon copies of each other: long blonde hair, green eyes, hourglass figures with large breasts, shapely asses and long legs. Laura has aged very well and still appears to be in her late 20's. Your Halloween costume is Dr. Hypno. He is a mad scientist who specializes in mind control and transformations. Little did anyone know that a certain witch had plans for this Halloween. She would turn everyone into their costume. The costumes becoming real will change the wearer's mind but only to a certain degree. They will retain their identity, but will take on several attributes from the costume, including all special abilities. You will look the same after your transformation, since Dr. Hypno's appearance is ambiguous, but you will gain all his abilities for making amazing devices out of household appliances.

Rules:
-Your character likes women, so any men have to be changed body and mind into women before they can enter his harem
-Maintain some age standard, meaning no kids and no old people
-No killing
-All devices you make are isomorphic, meaning only you can use them and you can't use them on yourself

Otherwise have fun
